82512.summary: Some customers in the Callaghan area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82512.title: Aug 26 - Edmonton (Callaghan) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

82509.summary: Some customers in the Rosewood area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
82509.title: Aug 26 - Saskatoon (Rosewood) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
